location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘SITRA OIL LOADING TERMINAL AT BAHREIN ISLAND, PERSIAN GULF. MOORING LAYOUT’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:180 x 251 mm, on sheet 280 x 365 mm

mods.abstract: Issued with the ‘Port Information Booklet’ published by the Bahrein Petroleum Company, signed ‘T.C.G.’ and dated February 28, 1946. Below title: ‘C-3041 supersedes S.F. Drwg. No 36492’.Distinctive Features:Depth shown by soundings and contours.Map produced to illustrate the Oil Loading Terminal facilities, general conditions and availability of supplies at Sitra Anchorage and Wharves with Lines and Chanel at Sitra Island shown.Includes an inset map of Bahrein with references to the British Admiralty Chart No. 2837b; an explanatory note with description of Bahrain Light Vessel, South Sitra Light Buoy, North Sitra light Buoy and their coordinates; and small plans showing detail of Moorings.
